DOC.brief_summary: The investigational drug SH T00186D oral contraceptive . The investigational drug use study contain estrogen ethinylestradiol ( EE ) progestogen drospirenone ( DRSP ) . The aim present study evaluate efficacy safety investigational drug treatment menstrual pain ( pelvic pain occur shortly , onset , menstruation ) . Two different regimen intake investigational product compare . Patients undergo 2 -3 Baseline cycle ( depend whether patient OC user ) , menstrual pain , bleed event , pain killer intake document . During observation period , intake hormonal contraceptive allow . Other contraceptive method ( condom spermicide , pessary spermicide ) use . If patient eligible study , randomly assign one two treatment group . Treatment group A take medication accord extend flexible regimen , i.e. , tablet intake trigger bleeding event . Treatment group B take study medication 24 + 4 day regimen . That mean , tablet take cycle day 1 - 24 contain hormone combination , whereas tablet 25 - 28 contain active ingredient , i.e. , call placebo tablet . Treatment last least 140 day , prolonged Treatment Group A depend occurrence menstrual bleeding . The overall study duration 10 month patient . During whole study period , 5 visit plan . At Screening Final examination , thorough physical examination gynecological examination ( include breath palpation cervical smear ) perform . Blood sample take safety laboratory parameter . Additional examination perform time , becomes necessary medical reason . Patients provide patient diary document intake study medication , bleed event day without bleeding , pregnancy test result , dysmenorrheic ( menstrual ) pain intensity interference daily activity , intake pain medication . The pain medication ( ibuprofen ) provide .
